item.title: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth
item.description:
About This Game



EPIC EMOTIONAL DRAMA
Two larger-than-life heroes brought together by the hand of fate, or perhaps something more sinister…

Ichiban Kasuga, an unstoppable underdog who’s no stranger to crawling up from rock bottom, and Kazuma Kiryu, a broken man facing down his last days.



BEST-IN-CLASS RPG ACTION
Experience one-of-a-kind combat with dynamic, fast-paced RPG battles where the battlefield becomes your weapon, and anything goes. Adapt your party’s skills to the situation with outlandish jobs and customizations to strategically subdue enemies with over-the-top moves.



INFINITE ADVENTURE
Live it up in Japan and explore all that Hawaii has to offer in an adventure so big it spans the Pacific. Unforgettable moments await at every step of the journey with a unique mix of quests and activities to enjoy at your leisure.



Deluxe Edition Content

- Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth game
- Master Vacation Bundle: Explore a bonus dungeon, get special Sujimon, resort guests, outfits, new game+ & more

Ultimate Edition Content

- Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth game
- Master Vacation Bundle: Explore a bonus dungeon, get special Sujimon, resort guests, outfits, new game+ & more
- Assorted Outfit Bundle: Customize your party's look with outfits & swimwear
- Sujimon & Resort Bundle: Get legendary Sujimon, resort guests and special boosters
- Yakuza CD Collection Set: Increase your in-game playlist with classic karaoke tracks

item.title: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy
item.description:
About This Game



Apollo Justice's Legal Journey Begins Anew!

Join rookie attorney Apollo Justice and his mentor, the legendary Phoenix Wright, in this collection of 3 games! This title features the 14 episodes of "Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney", "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Dual Destinies", and "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Spirit of Justice", and the 2 previously DLC-only Special Episodes for a total of 16 episodes!

Also included is a mountain of extra goodies that's sure to satisfy any Ace Attorney fan!

Orchestra Hall - Listen to the in-game background music and select orchestral arrangements!

Art Library - View illustrations, design specs, commissioned pieces, and even the special Spirit of Justice Prologue anime!

Animation Studio - Play around with character animations and recreate your favorite scenes!

This collection supports Japanese, English, French, German, Korean, and Traditional and Simplified Chinese. Mix and match to play in whichever languages you'd like!

Immerse yourself in this beautiful collection as you shout "Objection!" in these newly renovated halls of justice!

Some of the contents of the games in this collection are presented as initially released to preserve the games as originally created.

item.title: UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH II Sys:Celes
item.description:
About This Game

Sys:Celes sinks towards ruination.
For the Immortalize, the collapse of all that is, looms on the horizon.
The curtain rises on the final chapter of the Hollow Night. Catastrophe beckons...


Experience the Dramatic Stylish 2D Fighting Action in the latest entry of the UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH series!

The first numbered sequel in the series!

▼ Choose from a roster of 24 total characters, with renewed visuals!


3 new characters join the battle: Moonlight Dancer "Twin Barrel Beauty" Kaguya, Indomitable Rampart "Steel Guardian" Tsurugi, and Endless Entity "Eternal Re-Birth" Kuon.
You won’t be able to take your eyes off the intense battles between these 24 fighters with the highly detailed HD pixel art graphics!

▼ Simple inputs make it easy to jump into the fray!


New to fighting games? Not a problem – simple inputs mean even beginners can pull off moves with a single button!

▼ Now supporting rollback netcode for an improved online experience!


With the addition of Casual Matches, it’s easier than ever before to dive in and enjoy online battles.

▼ Introducing new moves and game mechanics!


All characters now boast new moves, such as Hyde’s Blaring Outrage and Linne’s Soaring Dragon.
The new game mechanics Creeping Edge and Celestial Vorpal open up additional depth to gameplay.

▼ The final chapter! A new tale of the Hollow Night…

Sever the cycle. An end to the endless.
May the tale of these countless Nights be concluded, on this eve, the moment of destiny.
A long-awaited continuation to the tale of the Hollow Night unfolds!

item.title: Plasma Orb
item.description:
About This Game

*** Dive in the beautiful and mysterious world with your Plasmorb! ***

Plasma orb is a marble-like game.
Plasmorb is a ball shaped creature that you are going to control
Roll your ball and go through different levels with mini-puzzles and narrow paths. And try not to break it and fall down!
You will encounter many hindrances, mazes and mysterious constructions
All the game levels look beautiful. You have to travel through an old forest, dangerous swamps and even explore the depths of underground!

item.title: Iragon
item.description:
About This Game

About the Game


We think the best way for us to explain this game is to tell you how we came up with this idea. Everybody who works at Repulse loves fantasy anime. We are huge fans of shows like Attack on Titan and Full Metal Alchemist. And we also like to play visual novels, especially the ones with erotic and lesbian content.

When we finished our last game, we asked ourselves: What if we could combine the elements we love most about anime and visual novels in an interactive VR experience that you could also play without VR. And that is exactly what Iragon is about.

You play the game as Darick, a poor kid from a small village. Everything for him changes when he meets a bisexual girl who gets ambushed by soldiers of the Empire. To help her, you must learn to use your magic, but on your quest to bring her home safe, you will have to journey into a dangerous frozen world. Along the way, you will battle enemy soldiers, undead skeletons, and perhaps cross paths with seductive creatures of the frozen land while you unlock new erotic adventures with her.

So this is ultimately a game about living out a high fantasy adventure, with a strong emphasis on putting the player in control. The game is meant to be experienced in VR, but we dedicated an equal amount of care to deliver a standard version that will work for players who do not have a VR headset.

Features

Whether you play in VR or not, you can expect us to deliver:


  • 3 Main storyline romance routes
  • 4 Side romance routes
  • 12 Monster girls you can romance
  • Interactive experiences with your love interests
  • Different outfits
  • Voice acting
  • Motion captured animations
  • A dynamic combat system that features both magic and melee;
  • Destructible environments;
  • A dialogue choice system that influences the response you get.

STORY

Be the hero, live the story, and go on an adventure of a lifetime while you immerse yourself fully in the world of Iragon, with a complete animated story and full voice acted cast. (skip options are also available for those who prefer to just get on with the action.)

GAMEPLAY

And yes, of course, this is not just a story you watch it is a game. Battle enemies, cast spells, collect loot, upgrade, interact with NPC's, go on quests. It has everything you would expect from a fantasy RPG game.

item.title: Lords of Exile
item.description:
About This Game

In ancient times of war in the Far East, the lands of Exilia were overrun by creatures of the night and samurais. Amidst this cruel conflict, only a bloodthirsty cursed knight can bring hope and vanquish the darkness.



Key features

Levels

Explore 8 levels of classic linear design, each featuring challenging obstacles and enemies to overcome. At the end of each level, you'll face off against a powerful boss that will put your skills to the test. And as Gabriel, you'll receive an extra skill after defeating each boss, allowing you to progress even further and take on greater challenges.



Gameplay Variety

Experience a range of mechanics, from throwing weapons to melee combat, down stabs, jumping, and dashing. Unlock the powers of Gabriel's curse to enhance your abilities. Play as both Gabriel and Lyria, each offering a unique and distinct gameplay experience for endless replayability.

Plus, once you've beaten the game with Gabriel, unlock two additional game modes: Speedrunner mode and Boss Rush mode. And the best part? You can play both of these modes with either Gabriel or Lyria for even more variety and fun!



Retro-aesthetic and sound design

Relive the glory days of classic gaming with retro-inspired 16-bit physics and perfectly polished controls. The game's stunning handcrafted 8-bit pixel art and fast anime-style animations, the 8-bit SFX and OST, enriched with sounds from the Megadrive sound chip, complete the immersive retro experience.

item.title: Circle Hitter
item.description:
About This Game

Warning

  • This game may be more difficult than it looks, so please use caution before playing for your mental health.

Main gameplay

  • Dodge: Slide the mouse to control the protagonist’s movement and dodge increasingly dense barrages.
  • Counterattack: Click the mouse at the right moment to bounce back the enemy’s bullets, and use the rebounded bullets to eliminate the enemy.
  • Stamina: Attacks consume stamina, which is restored when enemies are eliminated. Stamina also slowly recovers on its own.

Pick power-ups

Staying within the power-ups range can trigger powerful effects.

Global leaderboard

Survive and get amazing scores, occupy a place on the global leaderboard, and show off to your friends!

Many characters

By the way, remember to pick up the dropped coins and use them to unlock more unique characters.

Trial mode

Are you strong enough? Through trials, characters can gain stronger abilities!

More feature introductions

  • Easy to get started, just slide the mouse and click the left mouse button to enjoy the game.
  • Difficult to master, hone your mouse skills and become a master of mouse control!
  • Minimalistic graphics, interesting circular interface design.
  • Supports multiple languages (other than Chinese/English, other languages are machine-translated).
  • Steam achievements.
  • Steam cloud.

item.title: A Void Shaper
item.description:
About This Game

Shape the void with the power of your cursor! A Void Shaper is an arcade game about avoiding shapes and killing them, while you collect upgrades. Unlock new enemy shapes and upgrades as you progress through the game and complete your collection.


Your only task is to avoid the shapes and survive as long as possible. And all you have to do is to move your cursor.

You're controlling "Null Sphere+", a special probe sent by humanity to find a proper new planet.


There are lots of enemies and even a first boss you can encounter in the void. Each enemy shape has a specially adjusted behaviour and stats to keep the game fresh and exciting. Each enemy shape has different variations called "Champion" and "Giant", these have adjusted stats and can possibly even drop special upgrades. You will unlock new enemies and therefore new upgrades as you progress!

Your task as Null Sphere+ is to collect data, while you kill enemy shapes, the "Planetary Void Allocation Agency" (the organisation that sent Null Sphere+ into the void) researches new upgrades for your Null Sphere+ in the background.


Collect upgrades to get stronger. Each upgrade makes it easier to survive in the void. There are a lot of different upgrade types that you can unlock and collect as you progress. For example:
  • Attack Speed Increase (ASPD+)
  • Magnetism
  • Homing
  • Projectile Count Increase
I'm sure that you will find upgrades that you like!

Each upgrade either improves an existing component or even adds a new module to the Null Sphere+. This probe is the only chance for humanity to find new planets to inhabit, so all resources are invested to analyze the data that Null Sphere+ sends. This analyzed data is used to develop new improvements or modules.


It's time to shape the void! A Void Shaper features a masterfully handcrafted soundtrack, composed by K1ngKapra. The soundtrack is a combination of electronic and metal music. You will bang your head to this!

item.title: Library Fantasy
item.description:
About This Game

You are a powerful sorcerer working in a vast library of magic known as Fantasia. You need to unravel its secrets and restore order. Fantasia was known for its unparalleled collections of magical books, artifacts and knowledge, but in recent days, something has gone wrong.

The game is a 2D platformer with quest elements. You need to complete various tasks at the location and move further through the levels.

The pages of magical books began to riot, dark wizards hungry for knowledge and power began to attack the library, and dark magical rifts began to open in various places in the library.

You have to explore the library, uncover secrets, and stop dark wizards.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various tasks
- Good soundtrack

item.title: Search of the Source
item.description:
About This Game

Search of the Source is an exciting role-playing game in which you take on the role of a young squire venturing into a dangerous and mysterious magical forest. You have to complete many different tasks, explore mysterious places and fight mystical enemies.

Each task and battle will present you with new challenges, requiring your dexterity, determination and ability to make the right decisions.
As you travel through the magical forest, you will discover new places, meet different characters and reveal the secrets of this mysterious world. Your goal is to find the source of the evil that threatens the forest and defeat it to save this magical corner of nature.

Are you ready to venture into this exciting world and become a hero saving the magical forest?

item.title: OPERATION TEMPLE
item.description:
About This Game

You have to take on the role of a mercenary going on a dangerous mission, you are sent to an abandoned city to restore magical totems and destroy enemy invaders. On your way you will be threatened by dangerous enemies, monsters and traps, bravely overcome the greetings on your way and achieve your desired goal.

The game is a classic 2D platformer with action elements. Destroy enemies in the location, restore totems and complete assigned tasks.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various enemies
- Good soundtrack

item.title: Knight's Saga Evil Goblins
item.description:
About This Game

Knight's Saga: Evil Goblins is an exciting fantasy game where the world has been invaded by evil goblins and you take on the role of a brave warrior on a dangerous journey to destroy them. Exciting adventures and battles await you in the name of saving the kingdom. The game offers you the opportunity to plunge into a fascinating world where you will explore mysterious locations. Are you ready to walk this incredible path?

Your fighting skills and strategies will be tested in various battles, and your courage and bravery will be tested in dangerous adventures.
You will embark on an epic journey through mysterious lands, exploring colorful locations, meeting powerful enemies and gaining fame among the inhabitants of the kingdom.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and go on a dangerous journey to save the kingdom from evil?

item.title: SameShadow: Fernando's Journey
item.description:
About This Game

Prepare to embark on 'SameShadow: Fernando's Journey,' a third-person action RPG Roguelike set within an ever changing besieged Ukrainian city. As Fernando, your mission is to prevent a repeat of history, ensuring that Russian dominance doesn't extend further into European territory.

Master the Art of Combat:



Choose your combat style: Will you wield a razor-sharp sword with unmatched precision, unleash barrages of bullets, or confront enemies with bare fists? As you Awaken new powers within the skill tree, your choices will define your approach to combat and shape Fernando's journey.



Unleash your powers: Awaken extraordinary abilities, including Rapid Regeneration, allowing you to trade energy for rapid healing; Particle Acceleration, for blowing away and ragdolling enemies; and Time Dominion, slowing down time to dismantle foes without resistance. Harness these powers, but be cautious—extreme exertion can drain your health and energy.



Precision and devastation: Become a Sword Master, significantly improving your sword fighting style and speed. Execute Bullet Rush to unleash barrages of bullets, or use Rage to deal massive area damage based on your remaining energy.

Shape History:


'SameShadow: Fernando's Journey' combines the intensity of ARPG, RPG, Hack and Slash, and Third Person Shooter genres. Explore a world teetering on the brink of transformation, confront shadowy forces, and overcome challenges that will define Fernando's path.



Fernando's quest for answers leads to revelations that shape not only his journey but the fate of the future. Step into the darkness and become a legend in 'SameShadow: Fernando's Journey,' where the story unfolds amidst chaos and intrigue.

Are you ready to awaken your powers and ensure that history doesn't repeat itself?

item.title: HealQuest
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into an immersive and revitalizing experience with HealQuest, a revolutionary VR game that redefines the concept of playful physical activity. Transport yourself to a breathtaking tropical island, where idyllic landscapes invite adventure and well-being.

At the heart of HealQuest lies an innovative goal: to get moving in order to explore and interact with the environment. As you stroll through the island's winding trails, discover entry points that trigger dynamic and entertaining sports exercises. Whether performing jumps, stretches or cardio exercises, each activity is seamlessly integrated into the exploration of this paradise world.

One of the most captivating aspects of HealQuest lies in its interaction with the island's inhabitants: colorful, cheerful characters who invite you to play and progress. Forge bonds with local animals, overcome creature-specific challenges and improve your skills as you discover the island's secrets.

Thanks to visually stunning environments, total immersion in virtual reality and a variety of playfully integrated sports activities, HealQuest offers a unique gaming experience. Stimulating body and mind, this game invites players to escape on an enchanting adventure where fun, exploration and fitness meet.

Developed by the studio Voskalia, HealQuest is much more than a simple VR video game; it's an invitation to discover the pleasure of physical exercise and exploration in a heavenly setting, offering a revolutionary and refreshing gaming experience.

item.title: Pulsar, The VR Experience
item.description:
About This Game



PULSAR is an award-winning 40-minute Immersive Art Installation with occasional interaction: a tribute to the imaginative spirit of six-year-old Eloise who lost her battle with leukemia.

Three portals into deep space. Three unique, music-driven journeys.

PULSAR invites you to enter an artistic representation of Eloise’s final birthday wish. You are now a Galactic Observer and a Virtual Astronaut. You can transcend the fragility and physical restrictions of human existence and experience another dimension. Witness galactic events, the birth and demise of stars and planetary systems. Soak up the sights and sounds. Enjoy the slow discovery. Hear the captivating melodies of the Universe. Harness the energy in the pit of a Black Hole. Affect the flow of linear time. Venture on an unusual spacewalk. Demolish fierce asteroids to protect a planet from destruction. Co-create solar systems based on the rhythms, textures, and colors of universal frequencies. Extras offer you a 3D volume of scientific facts and animations.

PULSAR promises you delight, awe, wonder, and the freedom to create your own interpretation.

(Note: Headphones are recommended to experience the full audio immersion of Pulsar, The VR Experience)

item.title: MimiCries
item.description:
About This Game

MimiCries is a Victorian-inspired, narrative-driven puzzle room game where players investigate the devastated remnants of the tragic Griswald family, and escape from
the horrors of their accursed residence.

Key Features

Immersive Pixel-art



Drawing creatively from the Victorian period, all pixel-art in MimiCries has been meticulously curated to craft time-accurate environments, with astonishing designs that may literally take your breath away.

Interactive Puzzle-solving



Emulating your playable character's point-of-view, MimiCries offers a plethora of object
and character interactions, which evolve as you make progress with its variety of unique
and challenging puzzles.

Duality Of Light



As you traverse the dark rooms and corridors of the Griswald mansion in MimiCries,
the light sources you have on hand will both help and hinder your exploration. In the
engulfing darkness, will light be the key for your freedom?

All mysteries lay in wait for your unravelling. The Griswald mansion beckons...

item.title: Hiding Star
item.description:
About This Game

Single player game with puzzle elements and survival in a mysterious building, where you are chased by a mad attraction - Toothy Jack, who serves Hostess. Use Ball Gun to solve puzzles and move forward



Using the Ball Gun is not so easy, you need to calculate the distance to the target and the speed of the projectile.


Take cover, move cautiously along the narrow path, trying not to fall into the abyss, visiting strange rooms and memory-lost creatures.



Don’t let Toothy Jack see you!



The old amusement test room is full of secrets and dangers.


"Toothy Jack will bring you back. To the Hostess, to the Hostess... "

item.title: Devilish League
item.description:
About This Game

Swing, hit, and bounce! Blast enemies with your heavy bat in this hilarious cartoon roguelike!


About the game
Devilish League is a cartoon roguelike with heavy bat-swinging action!
You play as the badass Bash and face off against the evil Durahan's team!
Enjoy cool battles, tons of items to collect, and an addictive adventure as you blast away enemies!

Game Features
[1] A charming playing stage with a casual cartoon style
[2] Heavy charging attacks that hit hard with each blow
[3] Play and grow differently each time with various items
[4] Challenging boss and elite monsters to keep you on your toes

item.title: Undulations
item.description:
About This Game

This is a survival escape action game from a huge wave that will make you feel fear and despair within the first minute.

The setting is an exoplanet where waves of over 3,000 feet (about 900 meters) are constantly hitting the surface of the planet, due to the gravity of a giant red dwarf star and its orbital period of about 60 minutes.
The objective of the player is to escape from the waves and survive.

This game is an escape game, but there are no complicated puzzle elements; all you need is the courage and strength to overcome fear.

Overcoming this fear, thinking and acting in order to survive, continuing to challenge without giving up, and the scenery you see after surviving will surely leave a strong impression on the minds of those who play the game.

item.title: Crush Link TD
item.description:
About This Game



Don't waste your chance!

Your task is to protect your base preventing spam from getting into your inbox. Build towers in marked places to stop spam.

Crush Link TD is an unusual Tower Defense strategy game where you will meet unexpected mobs, defeat various bosses, upgrade virtual towers, earn in-game achievements and arrange a date with your crush.

item.title: A Nutritious Boyfriend
item.description:
About This Game

Amazing!

You have just started a new position as the first female human professional trainer at the prestigious Squirrel Fitness Club, a club for dedicated squirrels. Motivate and coach squirrel members until you stumble upon love with fun obstacles along the way. Finding your nutritious life partner won't be a crawl in the park but where there is hope, there is love! Enjoy this adventurous and adorable squirrel dating sim respectfully and heavily inspired by the avian dating sim Hatoful Boyfriend.

This rodent visual novel/dating sim includes 8 dateable squirrels all with unique traits and personalities, training your favorite squirrel may help him win his big race at the end of the game, and making the right choices may leave you with a big diamond acorn on your finger, but over-training any of the squirrels or making the wrong choices can lead to some pretty nutty consequences.

item.title: Godsvivors
item.description:
About This Game


Prepare for an epic experience that will leave you breathless! In Godsvivors, dive headfirst into a battle of divine proportions between the gods of Olympus and the relentless Hades. He's threatening the balance of the universe, and it's up to you, fearless player, to take action!

SLAY THE DEMONS

Prepare for epic showdowns with fearsome underworld enemies like the sinister ferryman Charon and the god of death himself, Thanatos. Improve your skills, unlock divine powers, and face the formidable Hades!

DIFFERENT GODS TO PLAY!

Choose from seven powerful gods - Ares, Apollo, Athena, Hephaestus, Hermes, Poseidon, and Zeus - each with unique abilities and distinct playstyles. Master their tactics, unleash devastating combos, and unleash the true divine power that runs through your veins!

POWERFUL WEAPONS

The action never stops! In a top-down roguelite frenzy of shooting, face endless hordes of demons as you dive into the depths of hell. Arm yourself to the teeth with an impressive variety of weapons, such as pistols, shotguns, rifles, and more. Every strategic choice matters as you face death head-on, fighting to survive for 15 minutes of pure adrenaline!

Features and Resources

  • 7 Playable Gods
  • Unique Abilities and Playstyles
  • Devastating Combos and Divine Power
  • Top-Down Roguelite Frenzy of Shooting
  • Endless Hordes of Demons
  • Impressive Variety of Weapons
  • Meaningful Strategic Choices
  • Epic Confrontations with Underworld Enemies
  • Skills Enhancement and Unlocking Divine Powers
  • Epic Battles between Gods and Hades
  • Elimination of Infernal Creatures
  • 15 Minutes of Adrenaline
  • Restoration of Order in the Underworld

    Get GODSVIVORS now and embark on an unforgettable journey of action and mythology!

item.title: Cipher Monk
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Cipher Monk!

Tease your brain in this number logic game where you have to use an old numeric system do decipher the answers!
Drag, rotate and drop the pieces to get the correct number!

Key features

Handcrafted Levels
The game comes with handcrafted levels that will tease your brain.

Simple controls
The game is played simply by dragging, rotating and droping the pieces.

Relaxing music
Originally composed music to help you focus and relax while solving the puzzles.

item.title: Will The Man Get Frog
item.description:
About This Game

Will The Man Get Frog is a semi-random writing game in which you compose haikus (japanese short poems) in a cute and soothing atmosphere. Carefully crafted constraints will help you be creative regardless of your writing skills. The minimal design gives you space to focus, explore and express yourself. No achievements, no scoring, no leaderboard. It's about you and the words spending quality time together.

A game session can take from 5 minutes to... well, hours. It all depends on how carried away you get. Sometimes you just want a little distraction, and sometimes it gets more introspective. Both are great ways to enjoy the game!

Pick words!Compose!Enjoy and Share!

FEATURES

  • Thousands of words to choose from!
  • Four beautiful pixel art backgrounds available, one per season!
  • An Inspiring chip-tune soundtrack made by the talented c.diffin!
  • Gif recording system: share your art with the world!
  • Streamer-friendly! Ask your viewers for advice, or have a writing workshop all together!
  • Asynchronous multiplayer-ish! "Shared Game" mode allows players to compose with the same word set using a clever password system. Get together, play and compare your works, or play by yourself, send your friends a poem and wait for theirs!
  • ... That's it, really. It's a small game.

Ok, my poem is ready. What do I win?

Well, you win… a .gif of your creation, to use however you see fit!

Maybe you'll be so proud that you'll post it on every social media.
Maybe it'll remind you of a loved one. Why not send it like a digital postcard?
Maybe it'll be personal, so you'll simply keep it close. As a souvenir.
Maybe it won't make much sense. That's okay, things don't always have to make sense.
Maybe you just won't like it. That's okay too, writing is hard. You can try again later.

Point is, I can't tell what you'll get out of it.
But it's probably worth exploring!

item.title: FROGUE
item.description:
About This Game

Embark in a procedurally generated journey in FROGUE, a Roguelike Bullet Hell Platformer.



Dash to avoid bullet and kill your enemies!


​​​
Throw knifes to kill them at a distance.



Out of options? No problem, freeze time and make your own solution!


​​

item.title: Plane Mechanic Simulator
item.description:
About This Game





Plane Mechanic Simulator puts you in a role of an RAF ground crew technician at the start of the Battle of Britain. You will face various tasks ranging from simple refueling to engine repairs and gun harmonization. In order to bring you the best possible experience we have meticulously recreated 3 legendary British aircraft of that era:

  • Supermarine Spitfire Mk.1
  • De Havilland Tiger Moth
  • De Havilland Mosquito
  • Hawker Hurricane
  • Bristol Blenheim
  • And more to come!


Plane Mechanic Simulator offers 81 missions, almost 800 parts to tinker with and an unprecedented attention to detail.

The game also features a unique campaign where you are assigned to a specific squadron with your own machine and pilot. Make a mistake and he might not return from a mission. Perform well and he will become an ace.

item.title: Worldcrusher - a survival clicker game
item.description:
About This Game

"Worldcrusher" is a simple clicker game that involves destruction of worlds, farming and a bit of space travel. Your world has been lost. Luckily, you've been given a chance to restore it. Travel through space, destroy other worlds piece by piece and collect the items in order to recover your own home.



Features:
  • Travel between planets, destroy plenty of objects on every one of them
  • Collect resources to restore your home planet
  • Grow plants in your homeworld

item.title: AlexanderBall: A Countryball Tale
item.description:
About This Game

JOIN OUR DISCORD:




Ascend to the Macedonian throne as Alexander the Great and relive his conquests. Fighting alongside redoubtable and quirky commanders, recruit numerous types of balls for your army, construct countless cities called Alexandria, and build an empire that stretches to the ends of the known world.

Main Features:


Complex Turn-Based Battles
Employ intricate tactics! Outflank your opponents for bonus damage! Instruct your infantry to fortify against attacks! Charge your cavalry into your foes! Keep your ranged units out of trouble and feather your enemies with arrows! Utilize your limited action points in any manner of your choosing each turn to command your army. A infinite range of possibilities await on the battlefield!

The Living, Breathing World of 4th Century BC
Navigate the complicated world of 4th century BC. The world is inhabited by various ‘Balls’, each with their own martial traditions, and each needing to be cajoled to join the Macedonian army. AlexanderBall must choose whether to win over these Balls through gold or glory.

Highly Customizable Army
Our expert ancient Greek mathematicians have discovered that players will be able to choose from billions of possible army combinations for their playthroughs of the campaigns. Add the wide variety of Alexander’s companions to boot and these numbers keep getting bigger. This wide range of possibilities will apply to PvP offline multiplayer battles as well, where your all-Bactrian army can smash your friend’s Hellenic League contingent!

Empire Management
Just as the historical Alexander the Great struggled to unite his disparate and unwieldy empire, AlexanderBall will face countless challenges to keep his empire from falling apart. Placing governors from amongst his companions in important seats of power, while maintaining high opinions with subjects will become a tricky balancing act that will test the players’ management skills.

Story-driven Experience
Relive and refight some of Alexander’s most iconic battles. As the journey progresses, Alexander’s legendary companions will grow and develop alongside their young king as the story takes them from their Greek homelands to the ends of the known world. Dozens of cutscenes crafted by a devoted art team will bring to life the most iconic moment’s from Alexander’s life and more!

Local PvP Multiplayer Battles
Challenge your friends to a duel that will test both players’ army management skills and their knowledge of turn-based tactics. Build a well balanced army with archers, infantry and cavalry, or try out ridiculous combinations such as all-Archer builds just to troll your opponents. Try out various combinations of units and generals and uncover a playstyle that could shake up armchair generalship for years to come!

item.title: RPG Plus - Virtual Tabletop
item.description:
About This Game

RPG Plus is the all-in-one solution for Tabletop RPG players. Thanks to its campaign manager tool, chat, character sheets, 2D and 3D map builder system, you can:

- Create your campaign as a Game Master or join your friends as a player
- Design your story by adding rooms (chats, maps, sheets) and selecting your players
- Make your map for each adventure using the 3D map maker system, and add setting items and miniatures for the characters
- Use advanced 3D dynamic lighting on the map
- Keep track of the initiative and who can move with an intuitive turn manager
- Upload and share an image to create 2D Maps
- Upload 2D images or 3D models (.stl files) to create custom 3D tokens
- Interact with the other players via chat: posting messages, rolling dice, sending stickers, and sharing links
- Record your character's features in a digital sheet. You can select an advanced template for pathfinder 2nd edition and D&D 5th edition, or a simple and flexible table system
- Enjoy the flexibility of a fully cross-platform with a similar experience in both mobile and desktop versions
- Access to a simple schematic How To guide for the different panels.

Thanks to its customizable design, RPG Plus can be used for any of your favorite RPGs. Fans of Pathfinder and D&D can enjoy a library of specific character sheet templates and characteristic miniatures, and many more features and graphic elements are uploaded periodically.

The 3D map includes almost 700 high-quality tokens. In addition, you can create your token library using 2D images or upload 3D models as STL files.

The 3D map also includes:
- an advanced and realistic dynamic lighting system
- 68 special light effects
- 18 types of walls
- a flexible multi-level system
- 118 grid textures
- a simple 3D distance measuring system
And much more!

Escape Flatland! Add a new dimension to your virtual tabletop encounters with RPG Plus!

item.title: Supermarket Times
item.description:
About This Game

Supermarket Times offers the player the chance to take on the exciting role of a normal person going shopping.

Key Features
  • Shopping
Browse a selection of surreal and thrilling products, including the renowned fat fat fatty’s fat powder™ - get fat for a laugh, Marl-bros cigarettes – a slippery slope indeed, and the captivating thick and milky mother’s magazine.


  • Chatting
Meet a cast of peculiar people for the first time (and for some hopefully the last time). Sid wants you to know he is not a pervert, Carol wants to make sure there is absolutely no processed meat in her son’s soup, James’ Dad bought him a skateboard with no wheels 15 years ago and he’s still sad about it.


  • Legendary Tasks
Complete Legendary Supermarket Tasks such as buy alcohol for the teenagers, hit the seagull with the rock and stamp on the rat .


  • Exploring
Discover strange and intriguing secrets!


Explore, shop and chat and eventually you may discover the super-secret of the supermarket!

item.title: Traveler Eternal Night
item.description:
About This Game

In the game "Traveler: Eternal Night" you will embody a brave fighter who goes on a dangerous journey to destroy the evil that threatens the world. You have to explore different locations, fight monsters and complete quests to become stronger. Your hero will have to endure many trials, but his courage and determination will help him overcome any obstacles. An exciting adventure awaits you, full of dangers and battles that will show what a true hero is capable of.

Various enemies await you along the way, each of which has its own unique abilities and weaknesses. You will have to use a variety of tactics and strategies to defeat your enemies and overcome all the challenges.

The game offers an interesting plot, colorful pixel graphics and exciting battles that will immerse you in a world of fantasy and adventure.

item.title: Unknown Signal
item.description:
About This Game

Unknown Signal is a 3D adventure game. You have received a mysterious signal and you have to find out what or who sent it. Arm yourself with the best weapons and explore the mysterious planet! Fight with unknown mechanical creatures, go through dangerous situations that await you on this mysterious planet! Find out what is hidden behind the mysterious signal and become a real hero!

Features
- Nice soundtrack
- Colorful graphics.
- Dangerous opponents

item.title: Arrowstorm Ascendant
item.description:
About This Game

About This Game


Arrowstorm Ascendant is a rogue-like shoot 'em up based on "Seraph's Last Stand" and "Vampire Survivors". Defeat hordes of dragons and wyverns with your outstanding archery skills. With each new wave you fight more enemies with more power, while also selecting one new upgrade. Create the most interesting, powerful or game breaking build and try to reach the top of the leaderboards.



Everytime you restart you lose your previous powerups, but you can acquire gold coins while playing to buy new upgrades:




You can choose 4 green cards and 4 blue cards after each wave. Find the best build possible and reach the highest level you can!

Features

  • 50 different cards with green, red or blue upgrades. Create your build using a combination of 4 blue and 4 green cards (red card are infinite).

  • 11 different skins to choose from, with each skin having its own advantage.

  • A leaderboard system divided by score, enemies defeated and coins obtained.

  • A boss fight once you reach a certain number of waves.

item.title: The Tale of (Your Name)
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on an exploration through a procedurally generated dungeon, brimming with ferocious monsters, perilous traps, and challenging puzzles. Dive into a distinctive 2D roguelike shooter experience, where each game unfolds as a unique journey.

In "The Tale of (Your Name)," take control of a character's role in a tabletop RPG setting, shaping their attributes and narrative. Collaborate with a group of friends to craft an epic medieval fantasy tale, featuring a protagonist armed with weapons ahead of their time.

Select your hero from three remarkable adventurers, each endowed with unique abilities, and set out on a journey filled with perils and discoveries. Venturing through a dungeon fraught with monsters, traps, and puzzles, your objective in each room is to locate a key to progress to the next challenge. As you advance, encounter narrative events that unfold your story—make critical choices in these events to proceed, decisions that might lead to wealth or pit you against a formidable monster.

Progressing through the dungeon, utilize your accumulated wealth to purchase and enhance your weaponry (yes, firearms in this setting—thanks to the campaign master's whimsy), as well as other resources.

Prepare for an exhilarating journey where, with each move, a new chapter emerges, and the fate of the protagonist rests in your hands. In "The Tale of (Your Name)," your unwritten story awaits. Confront challenges, make strategic choices, and become the unforgettable hero or villain of this captivating tale.

item.title: DEFENDUN : Hero Defense
item.description:
About This Game



Defenden is a strategy merge defense game!

There were two very powerful beings in the world, Bael and Deus, who were very close brothers, but for some reason their relationship deteriorated and they began to fight. Their fight had unacceptable negative consequences, and the dark energy that spread during the fight awakened long forgotten dungeon guardians and monsters, demons in volcanoes, and yetis in snowy regions. The angels and demons who came as reinforcements to stop the monsters from invading the villages and kingdoms of the uninhabited, gave the heroes the ability to merge with the monsters and use this ability to help them stop the onslaught of monsters. Help the heroes, Guardians!




Combine units according to a recipe.
Mix and match your favorite units to a set recipe. Build your own team by combining over 100 different units, each with unique traits and skills. Sometimes units are stronger uncombined, but higher tiers are usually better.

15 classes to differentiate units.
Build efficient teams with units that are categorized into 15 different classes. If you have a lot of units of the same class, you can use class enhancement cards effectively. (Individual characters do not have classes.)

Defeat over 200 themed monsters.
To clear the stages, you need to know the characteristics of each monster. Whether it's physical or magical damage reduction, multiple births, or the ability to summon monsters, know the characteristics of each monster to clear the wave.

Understand and utilize your unit's skills.
Understanding the skills of your units will help you organize your team. Try to balance physical and magical attack units, think about the ratio of damage over time, instant damage, and area of effect attacks, and combine units that stun, bind, and slow monsters.

Earn different passives each game to create different combinations.
Fill up the monster kill gauge or defeat boss monsters to earn the chests in the bottom right corner and spend them to upgrade individual units and earn class upgrade gold.



Clear the stage by understanding the boss's abilities.
Defeat bosses by recognizing their abilities to freeze or stun units, reposition units, or restore health.

Understand the structures that embody the concept of the stage.
Understand the features of maps that match the stage's concept, such as lava on the ground to give debuffs and water at the bottom to match the sea concept, and place your units correctly.

Use the diamonds you're rewarded for playing to become stronger.
Diamonds are rewarded for play and can be used to take units to the next game or to permanently strengthen a player's Passive. They're awarded after you play, so play a lot to customize your look by purchasing custom skins from the Shopkeeper and in-game event skins.

item.title: Monument village
item.description:
About This Game

Monument village is a peaceful turn-based medieval city-builder.

Gameplay

Start on a pristine island, and grow your village, building by building. You can build exactly one building per turn. At the end of each turn, all your buildings produce some resources.
The focus of the game is on building placement. Each building has bonuses and penalties depending on its neighbors, so take your time to choose where to place them and plan ahead.

As your village produces resources, you will gain knowledge and discover new innovations. Each one gives you a choice of bonuses and/or new buildings to unlock. You cannot get everything, so each playthrough will be different.

Every now and then, you will receive a request for some resources to be delivered. You have to do it, but you will have some time to adapt and prepare.

Finally, when your village and your economy has grown enough, you will be able to build your dream monument. Four monuments are available to choose from, each with its unique requirements and resources.

Features

  • Simple yet deep building placement system: find the right place for each building to optimize its production and that of its neighbors, present and future
  • Innovation system with many choices: choose unlocked buildings and bonuses from a large pool, making each playthrough unique
  • Many game options: choose from different map types and monuments

Story

You are a talented architect, eager to prove your skills and build the grand monument which sketch has been sitting on your desk for far too long. But you need a place to build it, and land isn't cheap.


After many days of searching, you finally make a deal with a wealthy merchant named Tessa. She owns an island on which there is enough space for your project. You accept her conditions without much thought.

Maybe you should have read the fine prints:
First surprise, the island is remote and pristine. You will have to find a way to attract workers and to gather resources from the island. Guess it's time to learn how to manage a village!
Moreover, until the monument is finished, Tessa can request any resource from you, and you will have to comply. Fail to do so and she will kick you out of the island. The longer you take to complete your project, the more you will have to deliver.

item.title: The Yellow Moon's School: The Ghosts Day
item.description:
About This Game

The Yellow Moon's School: The Ghosts Day is a top-down shooter game in which you
must shoot ghosts and destroy them to save the school.

You control a student with a gun and have to shoot and eliminate hordes of Ghosts
while avoiding contact with them. Some ghosts have guns and will shoot you.

When you destroy hordes, a new stronger horde will appear, so you may have to
upgrade to win.

When you kill a ghost, you earn money. Use the money to upgrade and get stronger.

item.title: The Patagonians
item.description:
About This Game

The events of this terrible night began ten years ago.
However, today they will overtake you and make you remember the promise made once.
Rushing to find your missing daughter, you will become participants in terrible events.
But this time it won't be possible to retreat.

The Patagonians is a 2D horror adventure inspired by horror movies from the 80s and 90s.
You have to explore creepy and unpleasant locations filled with disgusting monsters.
At the beginning of the journey, you will only have a torch in service.
So sometimes the best solution to save your own life is to run away.
To top it off, huge guardian bosses will stand in your way.
Their main task is not to let you into the lair of the Patagonians.
To win you will have to show ingenuity and patience.
Get ready! It will be very difficult.
What awaits you at the end of this story?
I'll leave it up to you to find out for yourself.

Waiting for you:

  • Original 2D graphics.
  • Atmospheric environment.
  • 3 zones and more than 20 locations.
  • 11 types of deadly enemies.
  • Simple controls.

item.title: Robot Multitool
item.description:
About This Game

Robot Multitool is a puzzle adventure about a multifunctional robot.

In your arsenal, you have the opportunity to cling and swing on a cable, release an electric charge of a certain power, shoot, remotely control a flying hand capable of pressing levers and buttons.
All the mechanics open up gradually as you progress through the game.
Thanks to all the robot's capabilities, you can interact with the environment to solve puzzles and skill tasks.

Story

At the beginning of the game, the drone connects the missing part to the robot and revives it. Due to the fact that the robot is broken, it is leaking energy. You must pick up a part for the flying arm and use it to get to the part that stops the leak as soon as possible.
During the game, you will find electronic notes from an unknown robot that will give you information about the place where you are and give you hints. He wants to help you get to the place where he is being kept locked up so that you can free him. You will have to complete all the puzzles, skill tasks and battles that you will encounter on your way.
It will not be easy to go all the way, as many robots will try to destroy you. Some of them you can just dodge, and some will have to fight. Also, puzzles require good ingenuity to solve them.

Mechanics

Controlled flying arm:

You can aim and shoot your right hand at the right place. Then you can switch between hand control and robot control. The hand has an energy scale. The arm is able to fly until the energy runs out. As soon as the hand falls and touches the surface, its energy is fully restored.
With the help of a controlled hand, you can reach levers and buttons that cannot be reached just like that. For example, the lever that opens the door you need is located behind a wall in which there is a small hole that only a hand can fit through.
The ability to be in one place in the form of a robot and in another place in the form of a hand is extremely useful in passing. As soon as you need two hands to open a large door or activate a large lever, you can return the hand to the robot.

Cable:

Your other hand is capable of releasing a cable that can cling to certain flying objects. Hanging on the rope, you can swing, go up and down, shortening or lengthening the rope.
You don't need a flying arm to hook, so you can control the flying arm by hanging on a rope. For example, you can hook a rope to a special object, and with your controlled hand press the lever that controls the movement of this object.

Weapon:

In the game you have to fight with some robots. To do this, you have a weapon that has a delay after each shot.
By pressing a certain key, you can switch the arm/weapon aiming mode. In the first mode, you aim to release the flying arm. In the second, to fire a weapon.

Electro-shot:

When you pick up a certain part, the right hand will have a new mode. Now, when you aim with your right hand, you can change the mode from releasing a flying hand to firing an electric charge. By pressing the shot key in this mode, the energy scale is filled. Releasing the key, you fire an electric charge with an energy level equal to the filling of the scale.
There are objects in the game that move depending on the level of energy that is allowed into them. In these cases, you will need to release an electric charge with a specific power. An electric charge can only be fired if the robot has a right hand. It can be used while on the cable.
